entries.text: The Annual Report of the Bank of Albania describes the activity of the Bank of Albania over one year. It highlights the work and achievements of the Bank.

entries.text: Monetary policy is the set of principles, measures and instruments, through which the central bank intervenes in the financial markets and in the economy.
